name: Pendulum Shot (The Shmoover Jam)
description:
Travel through the 6 levels and destroy your enemies in this "shoot-to-move" game.  Move in the air and over spikes. You have 2 guns, a shotgun and a grappling gun. shoot yourself up with the shotgun and then grapple on to the ceiling, walls or floor to move like a pendulum, or grapple onto Enemies to defeat them.

How fast can you swing through the game?

Made for The Shmoover Jam 2021.1
